pullRequest.title: Spark: Add connector APIs for DELETE/UPDATE/MERGE
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR adds APIs to support DELETE/UPDATE/MERGE operations in Spark.

commit.message: Spark: Add connector APIs for DELETE/UPDATE/MERGE

nodes.bodyText: Seems like Spark is about to freeze 3.1 from Monday so it is unfortunate we did not get this into Spark :(
